participant_1.background:
I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten.
i work for an architect firm.
I went on a quilting retreat in the mountains with my friends.
i have an autograph collection with more than 2000 signatures.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

participant_2.background:
I'm interested in learning more about nutrition and how it affects my physical and mental health.
i am from mexico.
i really love plants.
I wake up early and listen to Ween to get my creative juices flowing.
i won a beauty pageant one time but did not feel like it was worth the effort.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I love to garden and listen to music.
That's great! I'm a big fan of plants, too. I'm also an architect. Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm going to a quilting retreat in the mountains with my friends. What about you?
I'm going to a book signing with my favorite author. I'm really excited about it!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love reading mysteries.
Me too! I read a lot of mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten.
That's really cool. I'm glad you found something that helps you relax.
Thanks! I'm also trying to get in shape. I've been working out a few times a week.
That's great! I need to start working out more.
It's never too late to start! I'm going to try to go hiking this weekend.
That sounds like a great idea! I love hiking.
